name: Polyforce (HrSkully)
description:
This is my first Game called "Polyforce". As is an Endless Space Shooter!

You can Play it with Keyboard, "WASD" to Move and "space" for shooting.

The game is still in development and will be updated! Errors or comments can be communicated to me. I wish you a lot of fun and look forward to your feedback.

Thanks to Eon for our Music!!

The 3D Models and all the Scripts, UI, Logos and so on,  are created by myself.
